amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds appropriated in the bill for aid to Haiti until the President certifies to Congress that the government of Haiti is conducting an investigation on the murders of Mireille Bertin, Michel Gonzalez, and Jean Hubert Feuille.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 8 in the Congrressional Record of June 4, 1996, to prohibit the use of funds appropriated in the bill for aid to Haiti until the President certifies to Congress that the government of Haiti is conducting an investigation on the murders of Mireille Bertin, Michel Gonzalez, and Jean Hubert Feuille.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
